conbody.p:
MapReduce executorMapReduce jobsThe MapReduce executor can run an Avro to Parquet job or any custom MapReduce job that you want to use. You can use the following methods to create a custom MapReduce job:
Custom JobCreator - You can specify the job creator interface to use, then define the key-value job details.
Custom configuration object - You can specify the configuration object to use, then define the key value job details.
